OOC: It's in a forrest, I thought it would be a better idea than having it
underground where I couldn't get attacked, but back then, i did it to
relieve some stress being brought to me, back when everyone was accusing me
of cheating.

BIC: The base shakes under the damage. Mobster runs up.

"What are you doing? Are you absolutely crazy?" Deemos cried out as Mobster
rolls across the ground toward the base, standing next to it, he fires
several times. Deemos had been hidin behind a tree since Mobster dropped him
in order to block that shot. (Forgot to mention earlier) Deemos fled into
the base and got on a loudspeaker, getting a devious idea.

"I admit, Alliance, you are the better warriors here, but we are still a
fine group indeed. How about we join you? Would you mind giving up 2
soldiers (My bots are the ones he is talking about) in order to enlist my
large group? No jokes, no tricks, just an Alliance with the Alliance, to
destroy the Maximals and Predacons both. How about it?"
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, October 16, 2000 6:34 PM
Subject: Re: There Is No Escape


> What type of terrain is your base in, SoulStice?
>
> ::Bloodystrike/Reptilica::
>
> Bloodystrike dives under autogun fire, flying back up quickly to
> avoid more. He growls as a few shots hit him in the side, aiming his
> missile launcher at the Mafia base and firing.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Spinning to dodge autogun shots, Reptilica flies into the battle,
> looking around. Seeing WarMachine and Oblitertron doubleteaming
> Mobster, and deciding that the enemy gestalt had very little chance
> of winning, Reptilica takes out his missile launcher, firing it at
> the Mafia base.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > Mobster rolls away from the shots, and retreats toward the base, The
> > autoguns open fire on the enemies. (Your at my base now!)
>
>
>
>
